title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Dec 3 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Dec 3 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Like "Darth" Biden (as Clay has dubbed the president with his cold that he blames on his young grandson's kiss), Buck is nursing a strong cold. Clay hosts solo just before continuing his college football bus tour to the SEC Championship game in Atlanta. Biden's economy: Red states boom, blue states don't. Parents charged in Michigan school shooting. Manchin takes stand against Biden's vax mandate. Clay's legal advice on knowing your constitutional rights, how to handle a vaccine mandate in your workplace. Born-and-bred Tennessean Clay rants that new LSU coach Brian Kelly adopts worst southern accent of all-time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
